popup.notLoggedIn: Extension is not logged in, please login first
popup.showKolListDesc: Display followed KOL list on Twitter pages
popup.autoQueryDesc: Automatically display data when visiting user profiles

login.termsContent: Please read the following terms carefully. Using this extension indicates your agreement to comply with the relevant terms.
login.agreeTerms: I have read and agree to the terms of use
login.setupCompleteMessage: Congratulations! You have successfully configured the extension and can now start using it.
login.preloadingDesc: Caching your data in the background to improve experience...
login.dataCacheDesc: For the best user experience, we recommend caching your data now
login.cacheAdvantage1: Data ready on first visit, no waiting required
login.cacheAdvantage2: View cached data even when offline
login.cacheAdvantage3: Reduce API calls and improve response speed
login.cachingDataDesc: Caching your Twitter and wallet data, please wait...
login.cachingCompleteDesc: Data caching is complete, you can now proceed to the next step!
login.cachingProgressDesc: Fetching and caching your data from the server
login.cachingSuccessDesc: All data has been successfully cached locally
login.cachingInProgress: Caching data in progress, please wait...
login.cachingNote: Caching process may take a few minutes depending on your data volume
login.tokenDescription: Enter your authorization token to access extension features
login.tokenHelp: Please enter your API token. You can get your token by visiting @Tw3Track_bot on Telegram.
login.tokenSecurityInfo: Your token will be securely stored locally and used to authenticate API requests. Token format should be: Bearer [your-token-here]
login.verifyingDescription: Verifying your authorization token and retrieving account information
login.verifyingWait: Please wait while we verify your token...
login.verificationSuccessDescription: Your token has been successfully verified!
login.verificationFailedDescription: There was a problem verifying your token
login.accountDescription: Your account details and subscription information
login.languageDescription: Select your preferred extension interface language
login.languageHelp: Choose your preferred language. The interface will update immediately.
login.themeDescription: Select your preferred extension interface theme mode
login.themeHelp: Choose your preferred theme. The interface will update immediately to show a preview.
login.themeLightDesc: Always use bright colors and high contrast light mode
login.themeDarkDesc: Always use dark colors and reduced eye strain dark mode
login.themeAutoDesc: Automatically switch between light and dark based on system preference
login.termsDescription: Please read and accept the terms of use to continue
login.termsAndPrivacy: Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
login.termsReadCarefully: Please read the following terms carefully before proceeding
login.privacyPrinciples: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. This extension operates under the following principles:
login.dataStoredLocally: All data is stored locally on your device
login.tokensEncrypted: API tokens are encrypted and never shared with third parties
login.noPersonalInfo: No personal information is collected without consent
login.canDeleteData: You can delete all data at any time through settings
login.byUsingExtension: By using this extension, you agree to:
login.termsAcknowledge: Checking this box indicates that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.
login.configuredSettings: Your extension has been configured with the following settings
login.thankYou: Thank you for choosing our extension! 🎉
login.clickGetStarted: Click "Get Started" to close this setup and return to the extension
login.accessDashboard: Access the dashboard through the extension popup
login.exploreFeatures: Explore Web3 trends and custom settings
login.changePreferences: You can change language and theme preferences in settings at any time
login.complianceWithLaws: Use the extension in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
login.noReverseEngineering: Do not attempt to reverse engineer or modify the extension
login.respectRateLimits: Respect API rate limits and usage quotas
login.noMaliciousUse: Do not use the extension for any malicious or harmful activities
login.keepTokensSecure: Keep your API tokens secure and do not share them with others
login.apiUsageDesc: This extension connects to external APIs to provide its functionality. Please ensure you have proper authorization to use these APIs and comply with their terms of service.
login.dataBackupDesc: While we store data locally for security, we recommend backing up important configurations. The extension provides export/import functionality in settings.
login.contactSupportDesc: If you have any questions about these terms or need support, please contact us through:
login.scrollToRead: Please scroll down to read the complete terms
login.readComplete: You have read the complete terms of use
login.pleaseScrollFirst: Please scroll down to read the complete terms first
login.twitterSettingsDescription: Configure how the extension interacts with Twitter/X pages
login.twitterAutoQueryDescription: Automatically display KOL data when visiting Twitter user profiles
login.autoQueryExplanation: When enabled, the extension will automatically display relevant data on Twitter user profile pages
login.featureDescription1: Automatically display KOL data when visiting any Twitter user profile
login.featureDescription2: Data cached for 10 seconds to improve performance
login.featureDescription3: You can toggle this feature in popup settings at any time
login.dexPlatformSettingsDescription: Select default DEX platforms for each network for quick trading jumps
login.evmNetworkDesc: Including Ethereum, Base, BSC and other networks
login.dexSettingsNote1: EVM networks will show multiple platform options, other networks use default platforms
login.dexSettingsNote2: These preferences can be modified in settings at any time
login.dexSettingsNote3: These settings will be used for wallet address detection and block explorer injection features

serverCheck.onlineDescription: Server is online and ready to accept requests
serverCheck.offlineDescription: Server is currently unavailable or unresponsive
serverCheck.pleaseWait: Please wait while we check server status...
serverCheck.tip2: Verify that the server is running and accessible
serverCheck.tip3: If the problem persists, please contact technical support

twitterDisplay.title: X Web3 Analysis
twitterDisplay.notLoggedIn: Please login to view Web3 analysis data
twitterDisplay.loginPrompt: Click the extension icon to login
twitterDisplay.loginRequiredDesc: Login to view KOL analysis data
twitterDisplay.autoQueryDesc: Automatically fetch and display user data when visiting Twitter user profiles
twitterDisplay.serverError: Server error, please try again later
twitterDisplay.networkError: Network error, please check your connection
twitterDisplay.dataLoadFailed: Data loading failed, please try again later
twitterDisplay.chainDataDisclaimer: On-chain data is for reference only and does not constitute investment advice
twitterDisplay.userNotFound: No data record found for this user
twitterDisplay.showKolListDesc: Display KOL following list in a separate card
twitterDisplay.walletDisclaimer: *This address cannot be 100% confirmed as the user's wallet address, for reference only
twitterDisplay.upgradeDesc: This is a premium feature, please upgrade to premium to view profile change timeline.

emptyState.kolDescription: This user may not have any KOL follows, or data has not been collected yet
emptyState.historyDescription: This user may not have any relevant history change records
emptyState.walletDescription: No wallet addresses detected for this user

dashboard.title: Tw3Track Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: X Web3 Trends
dashboard.web3TrendsDesc: Track and analyze X Web3 market trends
dashboard.twitterTrendsDesc: Real-time monitoring of X platform KOL following trends
dashboard.aboutDesc: View application information and developer contact
dashboard.author: Author
dashboard.upgradeRequired: Please upgrade your plan to unlock this feature
dashboard.someAccountsHidden: Some accounts are private and cannot be displayed

about.subtitle: Twitter Web3 Data Tracking Extension
about.twitterAnalysisDesc: Real-time tracking of Twitter users' following changes, history records and KOL analysis
about.walletTrackingDesc: Automatically identify and manage wallet addresses associated with Twitter users
about.smartNotesDesc: Add personalized notes for Twitter users and wallet addresses
about.web3TrendsDesc: Track hot trends and market dynamics in the Web3 field
about.thankYouDesc: If you find this extension useful, please give us a ⭐ in the Chrome Web Store

logout.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to logout? You will need to re-enter your token to access extension features.

walletNotes.title: Wallet Notes

injection.extensionConnectionFailed: Extension connection failed, please refresh the page

walletNotes.editNoteDesc: Only note and source can be edited, wallet address and network type cannot be changed.
walletNotes.errorLoad: Failed to load wallet notes, please try again.
walletNotes.errorAdd: Add failed, please check your input.
walletNotes.deleteConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet note? This action cannot be undone.
walletNotes.searchPlaceholder: Search wallet, address, note or source...
walletNotes.refreshConfirmDesc: Refresh will re-fetch all wallet addresses, which may take some time. Continue?
walletNotes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

twitterNotes.title: Twitter Notes Management
twitterNotes.name: Name
twitterNotes.editNoteDesc: You can modify note content and tags. Tags can only be selected from fixed options.
twitterNotes.editNoteDescription: Edit note content and tags for this Twitter user
twitterNotes.deleteConfirmDesc: This action cannot be undone, are you sure you want to continue?
twitterNotes.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
twitterNotes.errorLoad: Failed to load Twitter notes, please try again.
twitterNotes.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one tag
twitterNotes.refreshConfirmDesc: Refresh will re-fetch the latest Twitter notes data from the server. This may take some time, are you sure you want to continue?
twitterNotes.tryAdjustSearch: Try adjusting search criteria or refresh data
twitterNotes.badgeTooltip: Click to add or edit note
twitterNotes.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
twitterNotes.noRestId: Click the note button next to the Twitter username to edit notes

settings.title: Settings

tabs.dataManagementDesc: Notes data refresh, export and cache management
tabs.dexPlatformsDesc: Configure DEX platform preferences for different blockchain networks

settings.refreshTwitterNotesDesc: Re-fetch the latest Twitter notes data
settings.refreshWalletNotesDesc: Re-fetch the latest wallet notes data
settings.dataManagementTip: Data will be automatically synced to local cache to improve access speed
settings.refreshTip: Recommended to use refresh function when data is abnormal or latest information is needed
settings.dataExportDesc: Export local cached data as CSV format files
settings.exportTwitterConfirmDesc: You are about to export all Twitter notes data to a CSV file
settings.exportWalletConfirmDesc: You are about to export all wallet notes data to a CSV file
settings.twitterDataFields: Twitter ID, Name, Username, Note, Tags, Created Time
settings.walletDataFields: Wallet Address, Network, Note, Source, Created Time
settings.twitterCacheManagementDesc: Manage Twitter data cache, clear historical cache to optimize extension performance
settings.cacheOverLimitDesc: To ensure normal extension operation, please clear historical cache. Too much cache may affect extension performance.
settings.clearCacheConfirmDesc: This operation will clear all Twitter data cache, including user data and follow change records. Data will need to be re-fetched after clearing.
settings.clearCacheWarning: Data needs to be re-fetched after clearing
settings.clearCacheSuccessDesc: All Twitter data cache has been cleared

cache.title: Cache Management
cache.clearConfirmDescription: This operation will clear all Twitter data cache, including user data and follow change records. Data will need to be re-fetched after clearing.

settings.refreshTwitterNotesDescription: Re-fetch the latest Twitter notes data
settings.refreshWalletNotesDescription: Re-fetch the latest wallet notes data
settings.exportTwitterNotesDescription: Export all Twitter notes data to CSV file
settings.exportWalletNotesDescription: Export all wallet notes data to CSV file

dexSettings.resetWarning: All current platform preference settings will be lost
